metadata.description: Voucher #1 of PROM allocation. Voucher is used to represent the lock-up allocations of a certain project, which is currently being used to trade in the OTC Market. Now, everyone can trade PROM's allocations on Opensea or Solv Vouchers by trading the Voucher onchain!
